# n8n_workflow_connection (Resource)

Defines a connection between workflow nodes for modular workflow composition. This resource exists only in Terraform state and generates JSON that can be used in n8n_workflow resources. No API calls are made.



<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `source_node` (String) Name of the source node
- `target_node` (String) Name of the destination node

### Optional

- `source_output` (String) Output type from source node (default: 'main')
- `source_output_index` (Number) Index of the source output (for nodes with multiple outputs like Switch)
- `target_input` (String) Input type to target node (default: 'main')
- `target_input_index` (Number) Index of the target input

### Read-Only

- `connection_json` (String) Computed JSON representation of this connection for use in workflows
- `id` (String) Unique identifier for this connection (computed)
